issue.title: [C++] Use CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR for consistency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-688](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-688). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Using CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR isn't required. It's just for
consistency. We already used CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR at
cpp/src/arrow/CMakeLists.txt.

Or we can revert CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR change at cpp/src/arrow/CMakeLists.txt.
